title: walletrecovery
author: walletrecovery
created_time: September 08, 2022, 05:18:13 AMLast edit: September 08, 2022, 01:52:49 PM by walletrecovery
content: In our hands was the wallet of a miner who mine bitcoin from autumn 2012 to spring 2013).If someone conducts some kind of survey among friends or acquaintances, and suddenly stumbles upon on this person,then in theory he will can recall the password from the wallet, or at least part of it,then we will be able to pick up the password with our powers and pay to an intermediary who found the minerand return rest coins to the owner of the wallet, who recall the password.
